#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;

struct point {
       int x;
       int y;
};

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--) {
               int a,b;
               cin >> a >> b;
               int grid[a][b];
               for(int i = 0;i < a;i++)
                       for(int j = 0;j < b;j++)
                               cin >> grid[i][j];
               queue<point> bfs;
               int visit[a][b];
               for(int i = 0;i < a;i++)
                       for(int j = 0;j < b;j++)
                               visit[i][j] = -1;
               point temp;
               temp.x = 0; temp.y = 0;
               visit[0][0] = 0;
               bfs.push(temp);
               int ans = -1;
               while(!bfs.empty()) {
                                   point node = bfs.front();
                                   bfs.pop();
                                   int xx = node.x;
                                   int yy = node.y;
                                   int d = visit[xx][yy];
                                   ans = max(ans,d);
                                   if(xx < a-1) {
                                         if(grid[xx+1][yy] > grid[xx][yy] && visit[xx+1][yy] == -1) {
                                                           visit[xx+1][yy] = d+1;
                                                           temp.x = xx+1; temp.y = yy;
                                                           bfs.push(temp);
                                         }
                                   }
                                   if(yy < b-1) {
                                         if(grid[xx][yy+1] > grid[xx][yy] && visit[xx][yy+1] == -1) {
                                                           visit[xx][yy+1] = d+1;
                                                           temp.x = xx; temp.y = yy+1;
                                                           bfs.push(temp);
                                         }
                                   }
               }
               cout << ans+1 << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
